data.event: Waterford had a station on the disused railway line from Bethania to Beaudesert the line station was closed before Beaudesert Rail was running in 2004.

Waterford has a number of heritage-listed sites, including: 40 Nerang Street, cnr Jordan Street: Waterford State School In the 2011 census, Waterford recorded a population of 3,931 people, 52.9% female and 47.1% male.
